algorithm.name: TIKAIMAGE
algorithm.description: The Apache Tika image detection component.

properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum confidence score which must be met or exceeded. Detections below this threshold are silently discarded.

properties.name: SAVE_PATH
properties.description: Specifies main directory for storing extracted images.

properties.name: ORGANIZE_BY_PAGE
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to store images sorted into subdirectories by page.

actions.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika image detection algorithm using the default parameters.

pipelines.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA TESSERACT OCR PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika image detection followed by Tika text detection on source media. Performs Tesseract OCR on derivative media.
tasks: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY TASK
TESSERACT OCR TEXT DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK

pipelines.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA TESSERACT OCR AND KEYWORD TAGGING PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika image detection followed by Tika text detection on source media. Performs Tesseract OCR on derivative media. Keyword tagging is performed on all TEXT results.
tasks: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY TASK
TESSERACT OCR TEXT DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK

pipelines.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA TESSERACT OCR (WITH EAST REGIONS) AND KEYWORD TAGGING AND MARKUP PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika image detection followed by Tika text detection on source media. Performs Tesseract OCR and markup on feed-forward regions from EAST on derivative media. Keyword tagging is performed on all TEXT results.
tasks: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY TASK
EAST TEXT DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK
TESSERACT OCR TEXT DETECTION (WITH FF REGION) DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK
OCV GENERIC MARKUP DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK

pipelines.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA OCV FACE PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika image detection on source media followed by OpenCV face detection on derivative media.
tasks: OCV FACE DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK

pipelines.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA OCV FACE AND MARKUP PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika image detection on source media followed by OpenCV face detection and markup on derivative media.
tasks: OCV FACE DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK
OCV GENERIC MARKUP DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK
